p: The impacts of three factors (location, population, and plant part) on dependent variables (contents of secondary metabolites) are presented in Table 1. The applied model for nested ANOVA is highly significant for each analyzed property ( p < 0.001; not shown). It is noticeable that for each property, there are statistically significant differences only between plant parts (above- and belowground). For half of the examined properties, there are differences between localities (Golija and Vlasina), while none of the properties show statistically significant differences between populations.
